meanings.definition: Enzymes that cause blood or other fluids to coagulate.
meanings.sent1: The coagulases in the blood helped stop the bleeding.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained how coagulases work to clot the blood.
meanings.sent3: The coagulases in the soup made it turn into a thick gel.
meanings.sent4: Her quick thinking acted like coagulases, bringing order to the chaotic situation.
meanings.sent5: The coagulases acted like tiny glue, sticking the broken pieces together.
